attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government has lost all moral authority; it has also lost all respect.
It can no longer make laws needed to run the United Kingdom.
It has lied to the people constantly and has sold us out to the EU which as far as I’m concerned amounts to TREASON!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
